parameter.name: title
parameter.label: Widget Title
parameter.description: This tile will be showed as header of widget block. Empty to disable

parameter.name: file
parameter.label: Cover Image File
parameter.description:
Enter image path or use format http://domain/yourimage.jpg. Or input image name with path.
Example: image_name.jpg(png|gif|jpeg|svg) or subfolder/image_name.jpg(png|gif|jpeg|svg).The "subfolder" is child folder in your_webroot_folder/pub/media/

parameter.name: mp4_file
parameter.label: Mp4 video file
parameter.description: Enter video path or use format http://domain/yourimage.mp4. Or input video mp4 name with path.The "subfolder" is child folder in your_webroot_folder/pub/media/

parameter.name: webm_file
parameter.label: Webm video file
parameter.description: Enter video path or use format http://domain/yourimage.webm. Or input video webm name with path.The "subfolder" is child folder in your_webroot_folder/pub/media/

parameter.name: ogg_file
parameter.label: Ogg video file
parameter.description: Enter video path or use format http://domain/yourimage.ogg. Or input video ogg name with path.The "subfolder" is child folder in your_webroot_folder/pub/media/

parameter.name: custom_class
parameter.label: Custom Css Classes
parameter.description: input css classes for video tag. Example: vjs-default-skin

parameter.name: subtitles_path
parameter.label: Subtitle file path
parameter.description: input subtitle file path. The file type .vtt and it should been stored in folder "pub/media"

parameter.name: subtitles_langcode
parameter.label: Subtitle language code
parameter.description: input subtitle language code. Default: en

parameter.name: subtitles_lang
parameter.label: Subtitle language label
parameter.description: input subtitle language label. Default: English

parameter.name: content
parameter.label: No Js Script Text
parameter.description: Input the explain text, it will show when no video js run.

parameter.name: video_template
parameter.label: Custom Widget Template
parameter.description: input custom widget template. Default: widget/html5_video.phtml
